Title: Requires the preparation of a neighborhood impact statement prior to the construction of a homeless shelter in cities with a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires the preparation of a neighborhood impact statement prior to the construction of a homeless shelter in cities with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Add Art 2-A Title 5 ยง54, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring the preparation of a neighborhood impact statement prior to the construction of a homeless shelter in cities with a population of one million or more
